short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A powerful browser extension for text analysis, translation, and summarization.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mokhatasr enhances your web surfing experience by allowing you to effortlessly select text and perform a variety of tasks. With just a right-click, you can summarize pages, correct or rephrase text, translate content, and conduct immigration checks. Most importantly, engage in interactive Q&A with websites using advanced Arabic AI technology powered by Allam. Experience seamless communication with your online content in an intuitive chat interface.
